titles.title: Dayan to Tama to Tobi Neko to: Mittsu no Neko no Monogatari
Cats Tail`s Tales
ダヤンとタマと飛び猫と ~3つの猫の物語~

anime.description: Note 1: An omnibus film consisting of three segments for http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=rel&aid=12415 [Tama], http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=animelist&adb.search=Dayan [Dayan] and [i]Tobi Neko franchises.[/i] Note 2: Tobi Neko`s segment is titled [i]Tabi Suru Tobi Neko (旅する飛び猫) and it is a live-action work. The franchise began when photographer Igarashi Kenta (五十嵐健太) released a photo collection of jumping cats in 2015.[/i]

episode.title: タマとふしぎな石像
Tama and the Mysterious Stone Statue
Tama to Fushigi na Sekizou
